Name: De Luwte
Review Text: Excellent food and service in a cosy and warm atmosphere. It's a little jem and a must go place if you are in Amsterdam.

Name: De Luwte
Review Text: This is a delightful little restaurant, it's located in a quite residential area on one of Amsterdam's cannels. The food here is exquisite. It's not cheap but it's well worth the money and well worth a visit.

Name: De Luwte

Name: De Luwte

Name: De Luwte
Review Text: Excellent quality and menu range, brilliant vegetarian options and great cuts of meat - I highly recommend the venison steak, it was one of the best I've ever had. Excellent service with very good knowledge of the whole running of a restaurant and proper etiquette - better than most places in the UK!

Name: De Luwte
Review Text: I came here two days in a row because of how friendly the staff was and because of their warm drinks. Coffee was good, but hot chocolate was better. Prices are okay, but the friendly service made it worth it.

Name: De Luwte

Name: De Luwte
Review Text: Very nice canal side restaurant, friendly wait staff (although they did disappear for a little bit) and the food was quite good. Scallops were well cooked if only seared on one side. The pasta was complex but tasty and the other main good but forgettable.

Name: De Luwte
Review Text:

Name: De Luwte

Name: De Luwte

Name: De Luwte
Review Text: Absolutely amazing experience! The service was impeccable with all servers being attentive and polite; the location is amazing with a view over a canal; and the food was one of the best food experiences I've ever had! Slightly pricey but worth everything!!!

Name: De Luwte
Review Text: Attentive and knowledgeable staff. Adventurous cuisine that works. Small select menu Clearly an accomplished chef. Fusion cuisine with finesse and style. Wine list/alcohol etc simple and complimentary.  An excellent night out.

Name: De Luwte
Review Text: One of the most wonderful experiences we had here in Amsterdam.  In our stay of 8 days, we have come back 3 or 4 times.  The services is so friendly and the food is right on point.  I absolutely recommend Dr Luwte to anyone who appreciates good food, atmosphere and friendliness.

Name: De Luwte
Review Text: One of my favourite restaurants in Amsterdam! Always delicious, good service and in the summer a nice patio. For Your Little Black Book I dine out 3 times a week and De Luwte is one of my best discoveries last year!
